name: The Rights Workshop
tag_list: copyright, copyright-clearance, music, music-supervision, talent-negotiation, rights-clearance, gaming, streaming, marketing, interactive
overview:
The Rights Workshop is a copyright clearance firm serving content producers in gaming, streaming, mobile, new media, interactive and other emerging platforms, as well as for corporate marketing purposes.

Based in San Francisco and helmed by Billboard-Award winning producer and music supervisor Brooke Wentz, TRW provides music supervision, licensing, rights clearance and talent negotiation services.

The firm has secured the rights for recorded music and lyric/tablature re-prints in offerings such as Guitar Pro, JamPlay, RedBana’s Audition, Doppleganger™s The Lounge or Heatwave Interactive™s Platinum Life Country,” and for corporate productions from companies such as Nvidia, Microsoft, Sun Microsystems and Marvell Semiconductors.
